Title: Summer Days with Coo
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Family, Fantasy
Writer: Keiichi Hara (screenplay), Masao Kogure (story), Yuichi Watanabe (story)
Actors: Kazato Tomizawa, Takahiro Yokokawa, Naoki Tanaka, Naomi Nishida
Plot: Kochi Uehara is a fourth grade student living in the suburb of Tokyo. One day he picks up a large stone which turns out to be a fossil of a baby "Kappa" (a mythical Japanese water creature)...
